Issue.creator: scottz
Issue.summary: PTE testcase: multihost openstack TPS LevelDB
Issue.description: TPS test (default network; refer to PTE/CITest/scenarios, similarities to FAB-3807-4i.sh or FAB-8192/8199). Use leveldb, stress mode, with 4 threads, 2 peers per 2 orgs, plus use 2 chans instead of 1, but replace NL with ATD, Cello, openstack multihost (maybe use 7 servers: 2 peers per host, 4 hosts for sharing orderers/kafkas/zks, 1 for pte cli). Use samplecc node chaincode. Variable payload size. Batchsize=500
